variable.name: SUBJID
variable.comment: Variable name: While hyphenated here, it is delimited by space instead in genotype files.

variable.name: Tissue Source
variable.description: Tissue Bank where samples orignated from
variable.value: Baltimore Longitudinal Study of Aging, sample obtained from Neuropathology Department, Johns Hopkins Hospital
Non-BLSA sample obtained from Neuropathology Department, Johns Hopkins
NICHD Brain and Tissue Bank for Developmental Disorders, University of Maryland Medical School

variable.name: Post Mortem Interval
variable.description: Time in hours from death to autopsy

variable.name: Cause of Death
variable.description: Cause of death provided if provided by brain bank
